attributes.action: instruct the Home Office to create a specific offence, with a realistic miminum sentence, of devastating lives by careless or dangerous driving
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Just because a victim of careless/dangerous driving isn't actually killed that doesn't mean his/her life hasn't been seriously affected.  The consequences of this can cause considerable suffering and change the lives of victims, and their families, in devastating ways; sometimes for the rest of their lives.  And yet, apparently (and appallingly/amazingly), there is no specific offence to deal with this so that the perpetrator can be punished appropriately.
